channel.title: Installation on Zeebe Node.js Client Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on Zeebe Node.js Client Guide

item.title: Install
item.description: The Zeebe Node client is available via npm. Add to an existing project npm i zeebe-node Create a new Node.js project mkdir myproject cd myproject npm init -y npm i zeebe-node Make it a TypeScript project npm i -g typescript tsc --init Optional: zbctl The zbctl binary is a command-line client that you can use to send commands to a Zeebe broker cluster. It is useful for debugging and testing.
